title: Ep. 99: The Current State of Movies
description:
The Ringer's Chris Ryan and Sean Fennessey discuss the year in movies and how to define success for one in 2016 (1:12). They also discuss ‘Arrival’ (18:33), ‘Hell or High Water’ (39:45), and which movies you should be excited to check out (44:00). 
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
